extensionDescription.message: block all visible likers or retweeters of a tweet.

popup_usageStep1.message: Once you click on a tweet, there is a link which indicates how many people liked this tweet. Click on that link to get the list of all likers.

popup_usageStep2.message: Then click on the new button on the top which says "Block all".

popup_usageStep3.message: All visible users are being collected. You can chose to block also direct retweeters and then confirm it with the OK Button.

popup_usageStep4.message: The list of users that are about to be blocked opens in new tab. You can still abort, exclude certain users or confirm the block action. If you use it for the first time, you will have to authorize the app to access your twitter account.

popup_donate.message:
Glad that you appreciate our work! ðŸ˜Š
We do this in our free time. This tool is and remains free for everyone and free from ads. Would you consider to donate a little tip?
popup_donate.description: text that encourages the user to donate

popup_reportBug.description: Label for the report bug button

popup_tweet.message: https://twitter.com/share?text=With the @LikersBlocker you can block people that like hate speech.&url=https://dmstern.github.io/likers-blocker&hashtags=LikersBlocker,sayNoToHateSpeech,ichbinhier
popup_tweet.description: href for the tweet button. Contains a prefilled tweet text.

ui_blockAll.description: Label for the Block all button

ui_usersFound.description: Message how many users have been collected. Gets prefixed the number of collected users.

ui_collectingUsernames.description: Message that tells the user that the tool is collecting users from a list.

ui_twitterHides.message: Some users may be hidden by Twitter.
ui_twitterHides.description: Message that is shown during or after collecting that tells the user that some users may be hidden.

ui_onlyListItems.message: We can only block users from this list
ui_onlyListItems.description: Message that tells the user, that only accounts that occur in the list can be blocked.

ui_blockRetweeters.description: Label of the checkbox where the user can chose to also block retweeters of the liked tweet.

ui_onlyDirectRetweeters.message: Only includes direct retweeters without a comment.

ui_copyToShare.message: Copy link to share block list.
ui_copyToShare.description: Label of the copy to clipboard button.

ui_copied.message: Copied. Share the link with other persons to share your block list with them.
ui_copied.description: Message that tells the user that the content of the block list has been copied to clipboard.

ui_urlLimit.message: Due to a technical URL length limit, the block list may be divided into several links.
ui_urlLimit.description: Info that tells the user that the block list may be divided into several links.

ui_takeAMoment.message: Depending on the number of blocked accounts, this may take a while.
ui_takeAMoment.description: Info that the collection of blocked accounts to export them may take long.

ui_divided.message: Divided into several links due to URL length limit.
ui_divided.description: Message that is shown after the collection of blocked account to export them if the list was divided into several links.

ui_confirmButtonLabel.description: The block button label for blocking each portion of accounts in large lists.

ui_warningHeading.message: Oops! Seems like your UI is hanging.
ui_warningHeading.description: The heading of the warning popup when the UI is hanging.

ui_warningText.message: Maybe you have changed the browser window. Please click OK or scroll with your mouse wheel to continue the user collection process.
ui_warningText.description: The main text of the UI hanging warning which tells the user what to do to continue the scroll process.

ui_doNotShowAgain.description: Button label for do not show again

ui_newRelease.message: You installed the latest LikersBlocker version. ðŸŽ‰ See what's new.

ichbinhier_heading.description: The heading of block confirmation page

ichbinhier_blockButtonLabel.description: The label of the block button on the confirmation page

ichbinhier_privacyInfo.message: We do not store any data except the usual server log files.
ichbinhier_privacyInfo.description: Login page: general privacy info that tells the user that there are not stored any private data.

ichbinhier_pivacyInfoHeroku.description: Login page: "here you can find". Is suffixed with ichbinhier_pivacyInfoHerokuLinkLabel

ichbinhier_pivacyInfoHerokuLinkLabel.message: privacy information to our hosting service Heroku
ichbinhier_pivacyInfoHerokuLinkLabel.description: Login page: privacy info Heroku link label

ichbinhier_repoInfo.message: You can find the source code of this web application on
ichbinhier_repoInfo.description: Login page: info where you can find the source code. Is suffixed with "GitHub"
